mapper.select: select no, name, password, message, to_char(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS')as reg_date from guestbook ORDER BY no desc"
mapper.insert: insert into guestbook values ( guestbook_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{password}, #{message}, SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: delete from guestbook where no = #{no} and password=#{password}";
